article_title: The Mythology Of Trump’s ‘Working Class’ Support
article_text: Get top stories and blog posts emailed to me each day. Newsletters may offer personalized content or advertisements. Learn More.

article_metadata.description: It’s been extremely common for news accounts to portray Donald Trump’s candidacy as a “working-class” rebellion against Republican elites.
